articles.author: James Rogerson
articles.title: Apple reportedly won't bring iPadOS 18 to three iPads, but there's better news for iPhones - TechRadar
articles.content: If you’ve been holding onto an older iPad then this might be the year to upgrade, as not only are we expecting to see the iPad Pro 2024, the iPad Air 6, the iPad 11, and the iPad mini 7, but Apple ap… [+2141 chars]
